Beef Stew.author: Nick Love
Beef Stew.recipe:
Cut meat and vegetables into .5-1.0 inch cubes

Pre-heat an oven to 300F or 150C

Heat some oil in the ceramic bowl

Coat the meat cubes in some flour and add to the pot

Sear meat, 3-6 minutes depending on portion of meat (1-2lbs)

Pour in beer (or wine) to deglaze pot while meat is still in

Cook off the alcohol, stirring the meat and meat crustings into the broth

Add all vegetables into the pot

Add beef broth in until all the contents are somewhat submerged

Stir contents to vary the parts

Place the lid on the pot, slightly cracked to allow the stew to "breathe"

Bake in the oven for 2.5 hours

Let sit for 30 minutes, add chopped parsley on top before serving

Egg Sandwich.author: Nick Love
Egg Sandwich.recipe:
Cook 1-3 Eggs.  Can be scrambled or fried.

Toast Bagel.

Add cheese to Bagel.

Add any add-ons.

Sample.author: User who wrote the meal preset
Sample.recipe: recipe, possibly in long formatted string

Scrambled Eggs.author: Nick Love
Scrambled Eggs.recipe:
Melt up to a tablespoon of butter in a low-medium heat non-stick saucepan

Add 1-5 whole eggs into the pan, do not beat eggs

Break the yolks and stir the eggs in the pan, scraping constantly

Keep pan from getting too hot: 
90 seconds on heat, 20 seconds off

Once the eggs are no longer runny, add the seasonings and add-ons of choice, folding them into the eggs

Finish cooking, 30 seconds more max

Spaghetti and Meatballs.author: Nick Love
Spaghetti and Meatballs.recipe:
Cook pasta
Bake meatballs
Add sauce
